attributes.action: Call upon Sky/bskyb to rectify volume issues with their Sky+ HD boxes.
attributes.additional_details: Please visit any online forum regarding this issue and accept the evidence and disatisfaction provided there by Sky customers.
attributes.background: Sky have altered/taken away the ability to alter sound settings on their Sky+ HD boxes.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. You can find more information about making a report to Trading Standards here:

https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/consumer/get-more-help/report-to-trading-standards/
